author: April
content:
To "form the equivalent" is my current mantra. Every now and then it happens in-camera with minimal post-processing, but that's rare. Then the question becomes one of close observation: What did I really see? Not, "Would it look better if I did this?"  ðŸ™‚

Your image is easy for me to enter and explore. I'm not the least distracted by wondering "How did he do that?" Instead, I wonder at what you saw.
